user_question: What are the latest advancements in tennis racket technology and generate an image of a futuristic tennis racket?
final_answer: Latest advancements in tennis racket technology include smart rackets with sensors for performance tracking, lightweight materials like graphene, and improved string tension systems. Image of a futuristic tennis racket generated. Smart rackets track metrics like swing speed, ball impact location, and spin.
